edu.upc.fib.prop.persistence.dao.users

Interface DaoUsers

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DaoUsersImpl

    public interface DaoUsers
    Data Access Object for users in persistence.

    • Method Detail

      • registerNewUser

        void registerNewUser(java.sql.Connection c,
                     User user)
              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates a user in persistence.
        Parameters:
        c - DB connection.
        user - User to register.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when SQLiteDB related error.

      • checkDetails

        User checkDetails(java.sql.Connection c,
                  java.lang.String email,
                  java.lang.String password)
           throws UserNotFoundException,
                  InvalidDetailsException,
                  java.sql.SQLException
        Checks email - password combination to login an user.
        Parameters:
        c - DB connection.
        email - Account email.
        password - Hashed password from the one that the user has given.
        Returns:
        User that matches the details.
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - when user's email doesn't exist in DB.
        InvalidDetailsException - when details doesn't match for a user.
        java.sql.SQLException - when SQLiteDB related error.

      • updateUser

        void updateUser(java.sql.Connection c,
                java.lang.String oldEmail,
                User updatedUser)
         throws UserNotFoundException,
                AlreadyExistingUserException
        Updates an user with new details.
        Parameters:
        c - DB connection.
        oldEmail - Already existing account old email.
        updatedUser - User details to update.
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - when user's email doesn't exist in DB.
        AlreadyExistingUserException - when user's email already exists in DB.

      • deleteUser

        void deleteUser(java.sql.Connection c,
                User user)
         throws UserNotFoundException,
                java.sql.SQLException
        Deletes an user in persistence.
        Parameters:
        c - DB connection.
        user - Already existing user to delete.
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - when user's email doesn't exist in DB.
        java.sql.SQLException - when SQLiteDB related error.

      • changeUserAvatar

        void changeUserAvatar(java.sql.Connection c,
                      java.lang.String email,
                      int avatar)
        Changes existing user avatar.
        Parameters:
        c - DB connection.
        email - Account email.
        avatar - Desired avatar id.
